sqlMap.select: select id, f_character_id, f_buffer_id, f_start_time, f_end_time from character_vip where f_character_id = #characterId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into character_vip (id, f_character_id, f_buffer_id, f_start_time, f_end_time) values (#id:INTEGER#, #characterId:INTEGER#, #bufferId:INTEGER#, #startTime:TIMESTAMP#, #endTime:TIMESTAMP#)
sqlMap.update: update character_vip set f_character_id = #characterId:INTEGER#, f_buffer_id = #bufferId:INTEGER#, f_start_time = #startTime:TIMESTAMP#, f_end_time = #endTime:TIMESTAMP# where id = #id:INTEGER#
